entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:05 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
